title: Rust Closures with Generic Constraints
description: In this lab, it is explained that closures in Rust use type anonymity, which requires the usage of generics when using closures as function parameters.

meta.title: Rust Closures with Generic Constraints
meta.description: Explore the type anonymity of Rust closures and how they require the use of generics when used as function parameters.
meta.keywords: Rust, closures, generics, type anonymity, Fn
